Package: uniandes.unacloud.file.db

[Java] Class ImageFileManager

    • uniandes.unacloud.file.db.ImageFileManager

    • Class used to execute query, update and delete processes in database for Image entity. added some queries for Repository and Platform entities

      Authors:
      CesarF
